Title: Inflammatory Information
Description:
<Shandris whispers to you.>

Do you see that up ahead? The Druids of the Flame have captured what appears to be a keeper--a guardian of nature, sacred to our people. If their power is already enough to...

<Shandris shakes her head, then gestures at the dense shrubbery nearby.>

Stay hidden with me and we will listen to the Incarnates, and perhaps discern what the druids intend to do with the keeper.
